body:
My view is that at some point in the future, TF might switch to using https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp/blob/master/absl/strings/str_cat.h, and it might make sense to keep things in line with how they might do things.

In fact, it might be worth sending either a PR or filing an issue to make sure that these two libraries stay roughly in sync.

body_text:
My view is that at some point in the future, TF might switch to using https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp/blob/master/absl/strings/str_cat.h, and it might make sense to keep things in line with how they might do things.
In fact, it might be worth sending either a PR or filing an issue to make sure that these two libraries stay roughly in sync.
